sql-script.name: organization
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_organization_account ( id char(32) not null, name varchar(32) not null, password varchar(32) default '' not null, status tinyint not null, accountmark tinyint not null, createdate timestamp not null, login bit not null, lastlogindate timestamp, lastloginip varchar(24), logintimes int not null, onlinemillis bigint not null, mailbinding bit not null, mobilebinding bit not null, unique(name), primary key(id) );

create table sf_organization_user ( id char(32) not null, departmentid char(32), text varchar(32) not null, sex varchar(2), birthday date, hometown varchar(32), email varchar(32), homephone varchar(16), officephone varchar(16), mobile varchar(16), address varchar(256), postcode varchar(8), qq varchar(16), msn varchar(16), description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique (oorder) );

create table sf_organization_department ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, departmenttype tinyint not null, description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(name), unique(parentid, text), unique (oorder) );

create table sf_organization_role ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), rolechartid char(32) not null, name varchar(64) not null, text varchar(32) not null, roletype tinyint not null, rolemark tinyint not null, userrole bit not null, rulehandler varchar(128), rulescript clob, description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(rolechartid, name), unique (oorder) );

create table sf_organization_rolechart ( id char(32) not null, departmentid char(32), name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, chartmark tinyint not null, description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique (name), unique (departmentid, text), unique (oorder) );

create table sf_organization_rolemember ( id char(32) not null, roleid char(32) not null, membertype tinyint not null, memberid char(32) not null, primaryrole bit not null, description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique (roleid, membertype, memberid), unique (oorder) );

create table sf_organization_roleresource ( id char(32) not null, roleid char(32) not null, resourcetype tinyint not null, resourceid char(32) not null, resourcetext varchar(64), description varchar(256), primary key(id), unique (roleid, resourcetype, resourceid) );
